bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

sense.def: Pathological Condition of a loss of semen brought forth by insufficient proper qi associated with a loss of its power of securing and containing. Kai bao xin xiang ding ben cao 開 寶 新 詳 定 本 草 Kai bao chong ding ben cao 開寶重定本草 Substance Entry yi zhi zi 益智子：主遺 精虛漏，小便餘瀝，益氣安神 , “It controls loss of essence/semen associated with depletion leakage ; trickling of residual urine, and it increases the qi and pacifies the spirit”.
